translation.home-left-text: Do you have any ideas? Let's bring them to life together!
translation.about-left-text: Hi, I'm Leonardo â€” a chess enthusiast and tech lover. I recently completed a 6-month, full-time intensive bootcamp at Boolean UK, dedicating over 1,000 hours to building my Full-Stack Development skills with JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL. Alongside my freelance work, I also took part in a 4-week project that gave me hands-on experience with Agile methodologies and Git workflows. Now, I'm excited to keep learning, growing, and contributing as a developer in a dynamic environment.

translation.omniloq-description: Encrypts every password, safely storing your accounts and logins. Create and save as many items you want. Available for desktop and mobile.
